item.description: Come join us for a Rocky Hill dog park playtime!! We are holding an indoor playgroup for dogs to romp and play. All friendly dogs are welcome, all breeds are welcome. We provide water, toys, and clean-up. It is the perfect opportunity for you and your pet to do some socializing. We do ask that all dogs are fully vaccinated with Rabies, Distemper, and Bordetella because they will be interacting with other dogs. There is a $5 charge, 100% of the money collected will be donated to help build our future dog park in Rocky Hill! Please help us raise funds.....while having a fun time in the process.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk.....meet-up is held in the doggy daycamp room.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Rocky HIll Dog Park Playtime
